name: Don't spill tea !
description:
At the moment, only playable with Unity already downloaded ! (I'm trying to fix that sorry.)

Move with WASD

(Sadly, nothing happens when you reach the goal)

A little game that I made for a student's project with the theme "Happy Objects". After finishing my bit, we all have put our games together to create one, where, when you reach the "goal" of the game, another one regenerates. 

I chose the theme of a girl who tries to get her tea to her room, trying to not spill it.

Animation, music and illustrations are all by me.

The Scripts where given to us.

Hope you have fun ! ^_^
